care.washingContent: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Use mild detergent. Do not bleach.
care.dryingContent: Tumble dry low or hang to dry. Remove promptly to prevent wrinkles.
care.ironingContent: Iron on low heat if needed. Use a pressing cloth for delicate fabrics.
care.storageContent: Store in a cool, dry place. Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading.

faq.customSizeAnswer: Yes, we offer custom sizing for all our curtain products. Please contact us with your measurements for a quote.
faq.samplesAnswer: Absolutely! We provide fabric samples so you can see and feel the material before ordering. Contact us to request samples.
faq.moq: What is the minimum order quantity?
faq.moqAnswer: For standard products, there is no minimum order. For custom orders, please contact us to discuss your requirements.
faq.leadTime: What is the production lead time?
faq.leadTimeAnswer: Standard products ship within 5-7 business days. Custom orders typically take 2-3 weeks depending on complexity.
